# MONEY::NETWORK_GET_REMAINING_TRANSFER_BALANCE

## Summary
Get the amount of remaining cash for transfers

## Returns
* **INT**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns the same value as NETWORK_GET_PVC_TRANSFER_BALANCE.
